member.name: T:System.AppContext
member.summary: Provides members for setting and retrieving data about an application's context.

member.name: P:System.AppContext.BaseDirectory
member.summary: Gets the pathname of the base directory that the assembly resolver uses to probe for assemblies.
member.returns: the pathname of the base directory that the assembly resolver uses to probe for assemblies.

member.name: M:System.AppContext.GetData(System.String)
member.summary: Returns the value of the named data element assigned to the current application domain.
member.param: The name of the data element.
member.returns: The value of name, if name identifies a named value; otherwise, null.

member.name: M:System.AppContext.SetSwitch(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Sets the value of a switch.

member.name: P:System.AppContext.TargetFrameworkName
member.summary: Gets the name of the framework version targeted by the current application.
member.returns: The name of the framework version targeted by the current application.

member.name: M:System.AppContext.TryGetSwitch(System.String,System.Boolean@)
member.summary: Tries to get the value of a switch.
member.param: When this method returns, contains the value of switchName if switchName was found, or false if switchName was not found. This parameter is passed uninitialized.
member.returns: true if switchName was set and the isEnabled argument contains the value of the switch; otherwise, false.
